MemoCutter
First Activity </--> Last cut audio files Search folders Insert the sound file manually or open by sharing from another App Select a file You dont have a file manager installed An error occurred while loading Show intro after start of app Share from another app
Edit Activity </--> Could not load the sound file Please wait.. Converting to .mp3 Cutting the audio file... A problem occurred while cutting Mark beginning Mark end Cut Audio You must set a valid beginning and end time Could not initialize FFMPEG, a normally a pre-installed library. Try downloading it to resolve this issue.
Search activity </--> search Are you sure you want to delete this? Remove Cancel Confirm Could not load files. Rename:
AppIntro </--> MemoCutter An easy way to cut and resend audio memos and audio files. How to load a file Look out for the share symbol over an audio file and choose this app as the target. Alternatively, you can browse your folders to choose a file manually. How to cut a file Use the range bar to define which part of the file you want to cut out. Press the bottom right button to cut out. Now you can instantly share your new audio files! Audio files The app gives you an overview over your audio files. You can delete a file by swiping it to the left. You can rename a file by long clicking an item. For your information, they are stored in the folder /AudioCutter.
Other </--> lastFile Plays the sound file you want to edit Plays the edited sound file Share audio via There is nothing you can share FileBrowserActivity AudioCutter
